title: Celiac Disease Diagnosis and Treatment Expert Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customized curriculum for aspiring medical professionals (medicine/life sciences majors) to strengthen core competencies in diagnosing and treating celiac disease

learning_goals: Explain the etiology, clinical symptoms, and diagnostic criteria (serological tests, biopsy) of celiac disease with 85% accuracy
Present the principles and practical applications of gluten-free diets with 90% accuracy
Establish differential diagnostic strategies for patients with atypical symptoms with 80% accuracy
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
